about_me.mobile_view_text: Creative Frontend Developer with an interdisciplinary background. Enthusiastic about IT since 2024. Designs user-centered websites with a focus on JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and UX/UI.
about_me.text1: I am a motivated Frontend Developer with a creative, interdisciplinary background. After years of working in various fields, I found my calling for IT in 2024. With a foundation in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and UX/UI design, I strive to create functional and aesthetically pleasing websites that offer an experience for the user.
about_me.text2: What fascinates me most about working as a developer is the creative aspect and the playful element in the code itself.
about_me.text3: Let's connect and create something amazing together!

competencen.text: I usedd a variety of front-end technologies. You can take a look on the ready projects in the next section.

work.text: Explore a selection of my work below interact with them to see my skills demonstrated.
work.description: Check out my Pokedex project, a fun and functional demonstration of my REST API integration skills. Using the comprehensive PokeAPI, you can browse through Pokémon details and see how I handle data retrieval and dynamic content rendering.

reviews.h2: What my colleagues say about me:

contact.text2: If I catch your attention, don´t hesitate to contact me with this formular. I would be happy to hear from you!
